system.description: The character has trained extensively with a specific weapon group, allowing them to use those weapons effectively.
system.benefit: Character can use all weapons of Class Pistol, Basic, Melee, Throwing, and Vehicle within the group they select without the -20 Penalty. Character requires Weapon Training (Heavy) and a weapon type training to wield heavy weapons without penalty. Weapon Types: Bolt, Chain, Flame, Las, Launcher, Melta, Plasma, Power, Low-Tech(Primitive), Shock, and SP Other: Heavy
system.notes: Specify weapon group: Bolt, Chain, Flame, Las, Launcher, Melta, Plasma, Power, Low-Tech, Shock, SP, or Heavy

specialAbilities.name: Weapon Group Proficiency
specialAbilities.description: Use all Pistol, Basic, Melee, Throwing, and Vehicle weapons in your chosen group without the -20 untrained penalty. Heavy weapons require both Heavy and type training.
